entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burns Lake Airport 07:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -17.7°C
Wind: ENE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
